message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I believe it's a great fit for you and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm looking to save a bit of money. I'm willing to pay $7500 for the product. I think it's a great price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I have to consider my own pricing strategy. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $8200. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7800 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me and my budget.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to make one last offer. I can sell it to you for $8500. This is the lowest price I can go, and I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value to you.
